titleStmt.title: A breife discovery of the people called Quakers and a warning to all people to beware of them, and of the their dangerous principles : being a true narrative of the sum and substance of two disputes with them at two severall meetings, that is to say, with John Whitehead at Gedney in Lincoln-shire, Sept. 2, and with George Whitehead and George Fox at Lin in Norfolk, Sept. 15, 1659 / by John Horne and Thomas Moore, Junior ...
titleStmt.author: Horn, John, 1614-1676.
Moore, Thomas, Junior.
